statements: DELETE FROM power_outages WHERE outage_location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM power_outages WHERE outage_id = 101 AND outage_location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM power_outages WHERE outage_type = 'Planned' AND outage_start_time < '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM grid_disturbances WHERE type = 'Equipment Failure' AND severity > 5;
DELETE FROM power_outages WHERE location = 'New York' AND cause = 'Weather';
DELETE FROM grid_disturbances WHERE type = 'Hardware Failure';
DELETE FROM GridDisturbances WHERE severity = 'High' AND location = 'City Hall';
DELETE FROM monitoring_devices WHERE location = 'Main Office' AND device_type = 'Sensor';
